mapper.update:
update transaction
txhash = #{txhash,jdbcType=CHAR},
blockhash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=CHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
total_input = #{totalInput,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
total_output = #{totalOutput,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
fees = #{fees,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where txid = #{txid,jdbcType=CHAR}

update transaction set txhash = #{txhash,jdbcType=CHAR}, blockhash = #{blockhash,jdbcType=CHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=BIGINT}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, total_input = #{totalInput,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, total_output = #{totalOutput,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fees = #{fees,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where txid = #{txid,jdbcType=CHAR}
